feature_desc: Describes the ID of the school
reason_removed: This is only used for located these schools in public systems, they have no impact on data and do not vary, simply a unique identifer instead of college name for sending transcript information

feature_desc:
Tracks the university's changes
over time, such as renames, location changes, and so on
